## Intersection type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type Intersection<A = Record<never, never>, B = Record<never, never>, C = Record<never, never>, D = Record<never, never>> = A & B & C & D extends infer U ? {
    [P in keyof U]: U[P];
} : never;
```
